source.title: Full source details
source.description: Return the full details about a source

_id.description: The unique identifier (source id) for this source

_created.description: The (unix timestamp) date value on which this source was created

annotations.description: The annotations that apply to this source.

user_instname.description: The instance name of the user that created this source

agent_instname.description: The instance name for the agent configuration used to create this source

parent_id.description: The unique identifier for the parent source of this source

child_ids.description: The unique identifiers for the child sources of this source.

sentence_count.description: The total number of sentences defined in this source

model_count.description: The total number of conceptual models defined in this source

sentences.description: A list of sentences that are defined in this source
